httpSample.responseData: {"data":[{"__typename":"Recommendation","recommendationId":"5c4f7637-9fa6-4869-a744-c2cc716ae28a","tileId":3847419179460953,"url":"https://www.theguardian.com/world/article/2024/sep/03/a-myopic-policy-indias-backing-of-ousted-bangladesh-leader-sheikh-hasina-leaves-it-in-a-bind?utm_source=pocket-newtab-en-intl","title":"‘A Myopic Policy’: India’s Backing of Ousted Bangladesh Leader Sheikh Hasina Leaves It in a Bind","excerpt":"It was earlier this month, as protests swept Bangladesh and bodies lay on the streets, that prime minister Sheikh Hasina hastily boarded a helicopter. She was unaccompanied by any political aides and did not tell any of her senior ministers she was leaving.","publisher":"The Guardian","imageUrl":"https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/pocket-curatedcorpusapi-prod-images/3e32d90d-f497-4617-8b41-38f5d97d1ed9.jpeg"},{"__typename":"Recommendation","recommendationId":"f9554f13-5e0d-4bdb-8299-30af178bee66","tileId":4063271794222845,"url":"https://www.vogue.in/content/why-are-we-all-looking-at-real-estate-on-instagram-that-we-definitely-cant-afford?utm_source=pocket-newtab-en-intl","title":"Would You Buy a House Worth 120 Crores On… Instagram?","excerpt":"And therein perhaps lies the answer to why I’m bombarded with reels about luxury real estate on Instagram—like moles that cannot be whacked out of sight.","publisher":"Vogue","imageUrl":"https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/pocket-curatedcorpusapi-prod-images/a0fec521-7809-4689-82bf-c05300dc3f03.jpeg"},{"__typename":"Recommendation","recommendationId":"532314b9-01cd-47e8-b18a-e070ae4898ef","tileId":753225919230776,"url":"https://finance.yahoo.com/news/warren-buffetts-career-advice-dont-142115511.html?utm_source=pocket-newtab-en-intl","title":"Warren Buffett’s Career Advice: ‘Don’t Think About Money, Take the Job That You Would Take If You Didn’t Need the Job’","excerpt":"Billionaire investor Warren Buffett shared some career advice as his company, Berkshire Hathaway, hit a $1 trillion market cap – a milestone that coincides with Buffett’s 94th birthday. What Happened: The “Oracle of Omaha” has had a significant week.","publisher":"Yahoo","imageUrl":"https://s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/pocket-curatedcorpusapi-prod-images/e60ebf16-74c9-455a-9563-31edc0634240.jpeg"},{"__typename":"Recommendation","recommendationId":"53cc62fe-2bc6-47b0-9e9a-7f4b8fac3530","tileId":4685648698365326,"url":"https://www.openculture.com/2024/08/solving-a-2500-year-old-puzzle-how-a-cambridge-student-cracked-an-ancient-sanskrit-code.html?utm_source=pocket-newtab-en-intl","title":"Solving a 2,500-Year-Old Puzzle: How a Cambridge Student Cracked an Ancient Sanskrit Code","excerpt":"If you find yourself grappling with an intellectual problem that’s gone unsolved for millennia, try taking a few months off and spending them on activities like swimming and meditating.","publisher":"Open Culture","imageUrl":"https://cdn8.openculture.com/2024/08/28223708/Screenshot-2024-08-27-at-9.30.18%E2%80%AFPM-1024x590.png"},{"__typename":"Recommendation","recommendationId":"5434010a-70a5-42b2-82b7-6695fd1f695b","tileId":8550780139300846,"url":"https://fortune.com/well/article/melatonin-vs-ashwagandha-for-sleep/?utm_source=pocket-newtab-en-intl","title":"Is Melatonin or Ashwagandha Better for Sleep?
